August 1, 2022
TeddyKGB
A great tertiary attacker. Improved Movement: Characters makes this click. Charge past the front line melee attackers and hit their support or tie up their range attacker. Whether its your opponent's PC, perplex, outwit or some other support, Batroc can generally knock them off their premium support clicks. Then your opponent has to either spend most of a turn dealing with your 30 point Batroc (he will need 2 hits to be put down) or ignore him and allow him to rampage through your opponent's back end. Either way, it's a great use of 30 points.

May 31, 2022
Bobcat2022
Improved Movement: Characters is getting overlooked on this guy, I feel like, and it probably shouldn't be. Really makes him appealing as a support-buster, charging through opposing tentpoles to take out their Perplex/SHIELD TA/etc. Not that you'd want to send him flying right at your opponent's Darcy Lewis--for one thing, his three damage wouldn't knock her out--but as a finisher, following up an Energy Explosion or a Party Thor Pulse Wave or etc. Anyway, he's "30 points" good.
